Controls:

Before Playing:
Hello everyone! The game have just 6 stages. This astonishing number is due to my experience.

Do you remember that 100 levels in one, with the Blue Elephant? I tried to do something like, with a twist, but let's just say that I took a bite more then I can chew. I found out that implementing new mechanics that I wanted but had no idea how to code, in this short time, is very challenging, and also rewarding when your idea works from the beginning. I'm not going to lie, I really had fun for my first jam, and I will look forward for the next one (I think I'll join one of the weekly one)

Credits:
Background Music - FallenLeaves by Hinaa on chosic.com

Assets - 2D Mega Pack by Brackeys on unity assetstore

Thank you again, feedback is really appreciated! Maybe points and ideas where I can do better. Keep on Jammin'!
